Name: Fighter X Fighter
About the game: The ruthless and arrogant enemies have come. All of them are armed with unique skills to make your home in crisis. Summon up courage to fight, you will become stronger, no difficulties can stop you, move forward! This game is an action role-playing game, including cultivation, platform jumping, maze and other elements. There are many kinds of enemies. Each enemy has unique attack methods. See through their tricks. You can acquire a variety of skills, and choosing skills pertinently will bring excellent results. In addition to skills, there are also opportunities to improve a variety of different talents and make yourself stronger. In addition, don't think that only you can become strong. When you meet a really powerful enemy, you will understand that the game is just beginning!
